title: riot. i am sorry but your client is so bad. PLZ make a new one
body: riot. i am sorry but your client is so bad. PLZ make a new one oh my gosh making my download every time need to wait 10 min before going in to the client

replies.body: This is exactly what people were saying when we had the previous client. It was replaced with what we have now. The focus was obviously on making it easier to develop, flashier, and filled with ads. Making it actually good _for the user_ was never a concern. I don't see the point of asking them to try again, given that they don't care about the same things we care about.
I never had anywhere near the amount of problems with the old client as i have with the new.

> [{quoted}](name=Tr4shB4NSYST3M,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=X8AyXJUy,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-06T17:10:45.178+0000)
>
> I never had anywhere near the amount of problems with the old client as i have with the new.

That doesn't affect what I said, though: people complained about the old client, and Riot took the opportunity to make a new one that served their goals rather than ours. And here we are.
